languages.text: {n}Инцендия опускает голову, и в зале словно сгущаются тени. Сияние ее глаз угасает.{/n} "Довольно. Я... каюсь. Я жаждала служить Императору, но нести Его врагам кару было столь сладко, что я забыла о долге во имя наслаждений. Футфол стал моим домом удовольствий. Я судила строго не потому, что Он этого желал, а потому, что так желала я. Я казнила тех, кого Он не велел казнить в законе своем. Страшнейший грех для Вольного Торговца — поставить себя выше Императора. Я впала в ересь... и должна быть осуждена".

{n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅低下了头，大厅四周的阴影似乎变得更浓了。她眼神中的光彩渐渐消失了。{/n}“够了，我……我忏悔。我渴望侍奉帝皇，但对敌人的复仇是如此甘美，我为了满足一己私欲，竟然背叛了我的职责。我把落脚港当成了我的玩物。我之所以这么严厉地下达判决，并非出于神皇的旨意，而是出于我个人的欲望。我处决了祂的律法禁止处决的那些人，我把自己凌驾于帝皇之上。这是行商浪人所能犯下的最可怕的罪行，我堕落成了异端分子……我必须受到审判。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅低下了头，大厅四周的阴影似乎变得更浓了。她眼神中的光彩渐渐消失了。{/n}“够了，我……我忏悔。我渴望侍奉帝皇，但对敌人的复仇是如此美味，我为了满足自己的私欲，竟然背叛了我的职责。我把落脚港当成了我的玩物。我之所以这么严厉地下达判决，并非出于神皇的旨意，而是出于我个人的欲望。我处决了祂的律法禁止处决的那些人，我把自己凌驾于帝皇智商。这是行商浪人所能犯下的最可怕的罪行，我堕落成了异端分子……我必须受到审判。”

languages.text: {n}インセンディアが頭を下げた瞬間、ホールの中の影が益々暗くなったようだった。彼女の目からは輝きが消えていた。{/n}「もう、十分だ…私は…後悔している。皇帝に仕えたかったが、皇帝の敵に復讐することはとても楽しく、己の満足のために義務を放棄してしまった。フットフォールを、快楽の館としていた。私は厳しく人を裁いた。それは、皇帝はそう望んていたからではなく、私自身が望んでいたからだ。皇帝の法が裁くことを禁じていた者まで、裁いてきた。皇帝の上に立つことは、自由開拓者が犯しうる最も恐ろしい罪だ。私は異端に陥ってしまった…だから、断罪されるべきなんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアが頭を下げた瞬間、ホールの中の影が益々濃くなったようだった。彼女の目からは輝きが消えていた。{/n}「もう、十分だ…私は…後悔している。皇帝に仕えたかったが、皇帝の敵に復讐することはとても楽しく、己の満足のために義務を放棄してしまった。フットフォールを、快楽の館としていた。私は厳しく人を裁いた。それは、皇帝はそう望んていたからではなく、私自身が望んでいたからだ。皇帝の法が裁くことを禁じていた者まで、裁いてきた。皇帝の上に立つことは、自由開拓者が犯しうる最も恐ろしい罪だ。私は異端に陥ってしまった…だから、有罪判決を受けなければならない」

languages.text: {n}Incendia baja la cabeza y las sombras de la sala parecen oscurecerse. El resplandor desaparece de sus ojos.{/n} «Basta. Me... arrepiento. Anhelaba servir al Emperador, pero vengarse de sus enemigos era tan gratificante que abandoné mi deber en aras de mi propia satisfacción. Convertí a Paso en mi patio de placeres. Juzgué con severidad no porque fuera lo que Él quería, sino porque era lo que yo quería. Ejecuté a aquellos que Su ley prohibía ejecutar. Ponerse por encima del Emperador es el acto más horrible que un Comerciante Independiente puede cometer. He caído en la herejía... y debo ser condenada».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia baja la cabeza y las sombras parecen espesarse alrededor de la sala. El resplandor desaparece de sus ojos.{/n} «Basta. Me... arrepiento. Anhelaba servir al Emperador, pero vengarse de sus enemigos era tan gratificante que abandoné mi deber en aras de mi propia satisfacción. Convertí a Paso en mi patio de placeres. Juzgué con severidad no porque fuera lo que Él quería, sino porque era lo que yo quería. Ejecuté a aquellos que Su ley prohibía ejecutar. Ponerse por encima del Emperador es la transgresión más horrible que un Comerciante Independiente puede cometer. He caído en la herejía... y debo ser condenada».

languages.text: {n}Incendia senkt den Kopf. Die Schatten im Raum scheinen sich zu verdunkeln. Das Strahlen verschwindet aus ihren Augen.{/n} "Genug. Ich ... bereue. Ich hatte nur das Verlangen, dem Imperator zu dienen. Doch Vergeltung an seinen Feinden zu üben, war derart köstlich, dass ich meine Pflicht ob meiner eigenen Genugtuung vernachlässigt habe. Ich habe Footfall zu meinem Haus der Vergnügungen gemacht. Nicht, weil er es wollte, war ich eine strenge Richterin, sondern weil ich es wollte. Ich habe Menschen hingerichtet, deren Hinrichtung sein Gesetz verbietet. Sich selbst über den Imperator zu stellen, ist das Schrecklichste, was ein Freihändler tun kann. Ich habe die Grenze zur Ketzerei überschritten ... und ich muss verurteilt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia senkt den Kopf. Die Schatten im Raum scheinen sich zu verdichten. Das Strahlen verschwindet aus ihren Augen.{/n} "Genug. Ich ... bereue. Ich hatte nur das Verlangen, dem Imperator zu dienen. Doch Vergeltung an seinen Feinden zu üben, war derart köstlich, dass ich meine Pflicht ob meiner eigenen Genugtuung vernachlässigt habe. Ich habe Footfall zu meinem Haus der Vergnügungen gemacht. Nicht, weil er es wollte, war ich eine strenge Richterin, sondern weil ich es wollte. Ich habe Menschen hingerichtet, deren Hinrichtung sein Gesetz verbietet. Sich selbst über den Imperator zu stellen, ist die schrecklichste Sünde, die ein Freihändler begehen kann. Ich habe die Grenze zur Ketzerei überschritten ... und ich muss verurteilt werden."

languages.text: {n}Incendia baisse la tête et les ombres semblent s'épaissir dans la salle. Son regard s'éteint.{/n} « Inutile. Je... me repens. J'ai toujours souhaité servir l'Empereur, mais je ressentais un tel plaisir en châtiant Ses ennemis que j'en ai oublié mon devoir par pur besoin de gratification. J'ai fait de Castel ma maison des délices. Si je suis devenue une juge aussi impitoyable, ce n'est pas parce qu'Il le voulait, mais parce que moi, je le désirais. J'ai mis à mort ceux que Sa loi interdisait d'exécuter. Se croire supérieur à l'Empereur est le pire crime qu'un libre-marchand puisse commettre. J'ai sombré dans l'hérésie... et je dois être condamnée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia baisse la tête et les ombres semblent s'épaissir dans la salle. Son regard s'éteint.{/n} « Ça suffit. Je... me repens. J'ai toujours souhaité servir l'Empereur, mais je ressentais un tel plaisir en châtiant Ses ennemis que j'en ai oublié mon devoir par pur besoin de gratification. J'ai fait de Castel ma maison des délices. Si je suis devenue une juge aussi impitoyable, ce n'est pas parce qu'Il le voulait, mais parce que moi, je le désirais. J'ai mis à mort ceux que Sa loi interdisait d'exécuter. Se croire supérieur à l'Empereur est le pire crime qu'un libre-marchand puisse commettre. J'ai sombré dans l'hérésie... et je dois être condamnée. »

languages.text: {n}İncendia başını eğiyor ve odadaki gölgeler âdeta daha da kararmış gibi hissettiriyor. Gözlerinin parlaklığı soluyor.{/n} "Yeter. Ben... Tövbe ediyorum. Her daim İmparator'a hizmet etmeyi arzulamışımdır ancak O'nun düşmanlarından intikam almak o kadar lezzetliydi ki, kendi tatminim uğruna vazifemi terk ettim. Binliman'ı kendi zevkim için kullandım. Adalet dağıtmak konusunda sert davrandım. Bunu O istediği için değil, kendim istediğim için yaptım. O'nun kanunlarının idam edilmesini yasakladıklarını idam ettim. Kendisini İmparator'un üzerinde görmek, bir Hür Tacir'in işleyebileceği en rezil suçtur. Kâfirliğe kapıldım ve... Cezalandırılmam gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia lowers her head, and the shadows in the room seem to darken. The radiance fades from her eyes.{/n} "Enough. I... repent. I yearned to serve the Emperor, but exacting vengeance upon His foes was so delicious that I abandoned my duty for the sake of my own gratification. I made Footfall my house of pleasures. I was a harsh judge not because it was what He wanted, but because it was what I wanted. I executed those His law forbade to execute. Putting oneself above the Emperor is the most terrible act a Rogue Trader can commit. I have lapsed into heresy... and I must be condemned."

Her daim İmparator'a hizmet etmeyi arzulamışımdır ancak O'nun düşmanlarından intikam almak o kadar lezzetliydi ki, kendi tatminim uğruna vazifemi terk ettim. Binliman'ı kendi zevkim için kullandım. Adalet dağıtmak konusunda sert davrandım. Bunu O istediği için değil, kendim istediğim için yaptım. O'nun kanunlarının idam edilmesini yasakladıklarını idam ettim. Kendisini İmparator'un üzerinde görmek, bir Hür Tacir'in işleyebileceği en rezil suçtur. Kâfirliğe kapıldım ve... Cezalandırılmam gerek."
